root.description: PC System RequirementsOS: Windows 98/ME/2000/XPProcessor: Pentium 3 @ 750 MHzMemory: 128 MB (256 MB on Windows 2000/XP)Hard Drive: 1 GB FreeVideo Memory: 32 MB (Radeon 7200/nVidia GeForce 2) Intel Chipsets are NOT supportedSound Card: DirectX CompatibleDirectX: 9.0
